statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({5.91}+{7.18}\right)}={26.18}\approx{26.18}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{7.18}\cdot{5.59}={40.1362}\approx{40.1}.
